setSelectedNodeId

public void setSelectedNodeId(java.lang.String selectedNodeId)
Sets the node id currently selected by the user in the diagram. It also determines whether we are editing a node or creating a new node through click. Depending on the case it sets up the state of the dialog.

Parameters:
selectedNodeId - - the currently selected node Id
